ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function

Interface Contextualizable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Function
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteValue, Addition, And, AtomicFunction, BooleanConnective, Circuit, Constant, ElementAt, Equals, Eventually, Filter, Fork, GetSize, Globally, IfThenElse, InstanceOf, IsGreaterThan, Multiplication, Next, Not, NumberCast, Or, ParameterizedVectorFunction, Split, Subtraction, Triangle.AllNumbers, Triangle.AllPositive, Triangle.IsPositive, Triangle.IsValidTriangle, Triangle.TriangleInequality, UnaryOperator, VectorAnd, VectorApply, VectorBooleanConnective, VectorFunction, VectorOr, VectorOutputFunction, VectorProduct, VectorSum, Window

    public interface Contextualizable
    Interface implemented by objects that can be assigned context elements, i.e. a memory made of key-value pairs. Keys are non-null strings, and values are any object (including null).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getContext(java.lang.String key)
      Gets a value from the object's context.
      void setContext(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets a value for a key in the object's context.
